alert.note: Alert for Okaloosa (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 23 at 3:13PM EDT until May 23 at 3:45PM EDT by NWS Mobile
info.description: The National Weather Service in Mobile has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Okaloosa County in northwestern Florida... * Until 245 PM CDT. * At 212 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 9 miles south of Laurel Hill, or 9 miles northeast of Crestview, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of northeastern Okaloosa County. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
